ygData.subject: Re: Race
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/28/99 6:12:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time, blizzard15@mindspring.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/28/99 6:12:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
blizzard15@... writes:

<< I am planning on making a shaman and I was wondering which you all think
is the best. I want a race that will be the strongest at higher levels, not
necessarily right away. Also if you could provide reasons it would help me
even more. Thanks for your time.

-Blizzard
>>


Well you only have three choices I believe - Barbarian - Troll - Ogre. If it
were Me I'd do a barbarian. While all races have advantages and
disadvantages, it is very important to know that Trolls and Ogres have a very
hard time getting into cities and crossing zones with guards from good races.
While I have played both an Erudite Wizard and a Barbarian Warrior - the
race/class combo I like the most is the Barbarian Shaman. Shaman's are great
because:

They got the single best spell in the game in my opinion which is Spirit of
Wolf (SOW)
can summon food and water
can bind and gate
great buff spells
decent melee fighters for having pretty good damage spells
Great healing spells


Wizaro
15th lvl Erudite Wizard
Solusek Ro
